name: Fidel & The Maker's Trial
description:
Fidel & The Maker's Trial is the first "full" game I've built in RPG Maker as a means to just test some programming knowledge (very basic knowledge) along my road to learning game design and programming, to hopefully one day build my magnum opus - but that's not today.
I'm not an artist, so I hope you can look past all of the default tiles and art assets used and can enjoy the game for what it is. Completion time will take about 2 - 3 hours.
